title: Professional language competency enhancement program through blended learning

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate job-related language proficiency and basic digital literacy
context.additional_context: Targets professionals in medical/legal/technical fields to improve practical language skills; emphasizes digital device utilization and collaborative learning environments

learning_goals: Establish clear learning objectives and expectations in blended learning environments that over 80% of learners can recognize
Enable over 90% of learners to effectively utilize high-quality digital learning materials through project-based activities
Improve learners' final project evaluation scores by 20% compared to baseline through collaborative learning strategies
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
